attributes.action: ensure that pollitical parties are funded by their members or supporters, and not by the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political parties should be funded only by their members.  Campaigning should be by means of television (and radio), as it is now, at no charge, with equal time for all parties, or via the press.  Election campaigning should be facts and information, not sloganeering via flashy billboards.
